column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Excellent steakhouse. Really cool speakeasy vibe if you're looking for an alternative to the traditional steakhouse atmosphere. We had amazing drinks- the bartenders here are legit. So much so that we went back up to the bar after our meal. Great service and menu selection. We had filets
column2: the mashed potatoes (standout) an awesome appetizer and everything was cooked perfectly.
